name: David Bailey
text: The food was good. Most Pizza Hut food is good. I myself love their pizza and pasta. This restaurant was understaffed on this night. Our server was doing triple duty. Give him 5 stars!  That everything was hot and tasty reflects the effort of this young man. Hopefully they will be better staffed in the future.

name: Keith Yancey
text: Food was good but the facility was nasty

name: Nicholas Carlozzi
text: Wife and I hadn't eaten all day. We got there like 6:15pm. Dined in. Placed our order, got an appetizer cuz we were famished. Apparently their fries don't come with ketchup, despite the menu listing that ketchup came with the fries. ‚Ä¶More

text: Unsanitary, no PPE during COVID period, belligerent ‚Äúmanager‚Äù, and completely disrespectful!  No customer skills whatsoever.

text: Doesn't deserve even one star! First time visit and last!   Ordered buffet  Pizzas were cold, hard and overcooked, brown lettuce on salad bar (not fresh) . We asked about medium everything deep dish pizza in place of buffet; too high ‚Ä¶More

text: Only person in restaurant.  Placed order, waited 25 minutes while other families entered, ordered,  and ate. I was then informed that my order was entered wrong and I would have to wait another 20 minutes with no comps or apologies. Decided ‚Ä¶More

text: The reason I'm only giving 1 star is I ordered a Large meat lover's and a personal pan pizza with extra sausage and received a small pizza with very little meat and the had personal pan had very little sausage.  And when they said they ‚Ä¶More

text: We went for the buffet, and the entire bar was lacking. The lettuce on the salad bar was brown, and the marinara sauce on the pizza bar had been so long the water had already separated from the paste. The pasta and pizza both were dried out ‚Ä¶More

text: Very friendly service. Clean. I had the lunch buffet and it was well stocked and clean.

text: Pizza was average. I had the buffet. They didn't keep it stocked. As soon as they would put one maybe two pizzas out people would swarm it and it would be gone. And you would have to wait 5 minutes or more for more to be put out

text: Our visit was not that good. The service was not that good, but the waitress was good given the circumstances. She was apparently the only person working the dining area. If she would have had more help, then I think the service would have been better. The pizza was good and came out quick.

name: Tommy
text: Place was clean, variety of pizzas to choose from..good salads. Waitress was friendly and our drinks filled. Good price for lunch buffet.

name: Summer Dawn
text: Ordered food at 8:26.. got the text it was out for delivery at 8:46.. and then I sit here waiting on my food it‚Äôs now 10:30 and they‚Äôre closed.. never received my food. I have to call tomorrow and apparently receive double of my order but that‚Äôs not helping me tonight!

name: Brisa Burton
text: Pizzas were ordered online at 7:58 pm. And I was sent a message saying it was out for delivery at 8:14 pm. Pizza do not arrive until 9:22 pm. Pizza was cold when It got to me. One of them was also made wrong. Will be ordering from dominos ‚Ä¶More

text: It was everything I should expect from Pizza Hut. The pizza was good and fast. The service e was prompt (and average). The price was as advertised. Sand the pizza was a little smaller than I thought it would be, (that's life)

name: Justin Hansen
text: My pizza wasn't cooked all the way through... But when you have the munchies almost anything will suffice. I sucked it up and ate my semi-raw pizza because that's life. It wasn't the pizza that I wanted but it was the pizza I deserved! Just cook it all the way through next time and we're square ;)

name: Kimberly Pearson
text: Great lunch spot! Buffet available on Sundays here, and only $4.99 when you buy a drink!!

name: David Parrish
text: Order two medium pizzas at 7:15 according to my order receipt. I was told 15-20 minutes. 8:00 rolls around and no one was at the front desk for at least 15 minutes because they were arguing in the back. I left the restaurant very disappointed and unsatified. No wonder I haven‚Äôt been to a Pizza Hut in over a year.

text: Very rude. Tried to call in my order and was hung up on because I am not a local. I would not recommend this Pizza Hut to anyone. Customer service is lacking in all aspects. Tried to call again and was told to wait. I stayed on the phone ‚Ä¶More

name: Bryanna Huggins
text: Awful awful awful. $47.50 for a medium pizza, wings, and breadsticks. The bottom of the pizza was paper thin (not an exaggeration). I peeled the toppings off and you could fold the crust to the size of a quarter. It tasted so bad. I won't go back. I would rather give 0 stars.

name: Thomas Fisher
text: Slow, slow service.  They are understaffed and it shows in appearance and speed.

name: Barry Richardson
text: Slow service. Not enough employees to run tje dinning room.

name: Jazsmin Hines
text: Service was horrible! Waitress (her name is SHELBY) Absolutely did not know what she was doing and she ended up giving my friends and I the wrong information and we had to pay more than we planned. If she's your waitress my best bet to you is request another waitress from the start.

name: Marcus Menge
text: Took almost 2 hours to recieve a pizza. It was practically liquified and stuck to the cardboard when i got it... avoid at all costs!!!

name: Kasie King
text: If I could give it no stars I would. When I arrived for the lunch buffet no one was in sight. I eventually had to step towards the back after waiting for over 10 minutes. Drinks are kept on the other side of the counter. No one, not once, ‚Ä¶More

name: Lisa Hankins
text: Stopped in to have lunch on our way back from visiting family in Tennessee.  The floors over the entire dinning area were a complete mess. Would we stop there again, no. This was 3 days ago never again. My stomach is still tore up.

text: Was the worse food I ever had. Paid a 5 star price for a low rate restaurant that should be shut down.

name: Samantha Cline
text: Waitress got our order wrong. Never refilled drinks and never came back after she brought food out to us. Completely unsatisfied with our visit and service

name: Dale Albritton
text: If I could leave 0 stars I would.. called for delivery at 915 pm closes at 10. They wouldn't deliver. . Sorry but if you advertise delivery till 10 you should honor it. Bad business.

name: Sandy Sparks
text: Website is a joke. People at the store are frustrated because they can't do their jobs in the store for having to correct the web page short comings. You just really need to work on the web page. You have lost many orders from me just because of the bad website!! And you will continue to do so.

text: Horrible,  My name is Donnie Mitchell. I live downtown, a short distance. 4 consecutive times, Pizza is cold, 2 hours wait time.  Their answering  service is not local,  you can't call to check the DELIVERY status. Horrible,  Horrible

text: The worst pizza hut ever  didn't bring all my food. Wouldn't give me ranch. All my food was cold. Would not work with me on fixing my meal. Took a hour and a half to get to my hotel. Manager was very rude and told me she cant do nothin about it. Very rude people  the only thing nice was the driver
